Name: Xianyun
Title: "Passerine Herald" Xianyun
Source: Reward for inviting Xianyun to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

C115101.Name: Skyladder
C115101.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character": </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C115104.Name: Driftcloud Wave
C115104.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you switch to the character to which this is attached:</color> Deal 1 $[K105].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)

K105.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>
K105.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

15103.Name: Stars Gather at Dusk
15103.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Heals all allied characters for 1 HP. Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115102]</color> in your Hand.\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115102]</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S1151021]</color>)

C115102.Name: Starwicker
C115102.Desc: $[K58]: $[S1151021]\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>\n(A character can only equip 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique at a time)

K58.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>
K58.Desc: When the active character is equipped with a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique card, they can use the corresponding {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008} Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
